display_name: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale: Over the past 2 weeks, I had trouble keeping my mind on what I was doing.
description:
Item from the CESD Questionnaire. [Radloff, L. S. (1977)](https://doi.org/10.1177/014662167700100306)
